attributes.action: Change the education system to avoid putting stress and pressure on teenagers.
attributes.additional_details: Teenagers are moving towards drinking, smoking and doing drugs due to the pressure and stress they are put under with exams and school work.
attributes.background: Change the current education system to something with less exams and pressure to complete large assignments or courses. The stress and pressure put onto students leads to forms of mental health illness and problems later on in life.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562814

If you want the Government to change the educational system in a different way to the above petition, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
